post:
Halloween is my favorite event of the year!
So in order to celebrate, you have the chance to grab servers at amazing prices!


![](https://myroot.pw/share/halloween2020.jpg "")


MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery in less than 24 Hours!

==================>>Server Inventory:

**MR1:**
C3558 (4c,4t)
32GB ECC RAM
1x 120 GB NVME
2x 4TB HDD (CMR)
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~55~~ **46.75 EURO per Month (55.25 USD)**  - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1&coupon=Halloween2020 "ORDER")

**MR3**
Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
32GB ECC RAM
2x 4TB HDD (CMR), 7200 rpm
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~70~~ **59.5 EURO per Month  (68 USD)** - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=3&coupon=Halloween2020 "ORDER")

**MR4**
Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)

5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~70~~ **59.5 EURO per Month (68 USD)**  - [ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=4&coupon=Halloween2020 "ORDER")
 
**MR5:**
C2550 (4c,4t)
16GB ECC RAM
4x 3TB HDD
5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
IPMI/HTML5 Console Available
=> ~~45~~ **38.25 EURO per Month (46.75 USD)** - [ ORDER](https://myroot.pw/user/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=6&coupon=Halloween2020 " ORDER")


==================>>Addon Pricing:
 
General:
* IPv4 Addresses: +1x ipv4......+1.5 Euro/Month
* Upgrade to 10TB Transfer ......+10 Eur/Month

* PayPal
